title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.3 - Rental not to be determined by receipts or net profits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.3 - Rental not to be determined by receipts or net profits

State Regulations

No bingo games shall be conducted on or within any leased
premises if rental under such lease is to be paid wholly or partly, on the
basis of a percentage of the receipts or net profits derived from the conduct
of such games. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4822.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
